##Vectors
A collection of values of the same type
```{r}
x <- 15.25
x[1]
length(x)
```
### Indexing
```{r}
x <- c(6, 5, 1, 15, 3, 4) 
x[3]
```
```{r}
x[4] <- 15
x
```
```{r}
y <- x
x
y
```
Assignment can be understood a value semantic assignment: 'x' and 'y' are different vectors with the same initial content. Therefore modifying x has no effect on 'y'
```{r}
x[1] <- 18
x
y
```
